humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 3 out of 17 lymph nodes are positive for metastatic carcinoma. This corresponds to N1 according to Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for a patient is determined by the number of lymph nodes involved and the size of the metastasis. In this report, it is stated that 3 out of 17 nodes are positive for metastatic carcinoma, and the largest metastatic focus is 1.2 cm (microscopic measurement). Therefore, the N stage is N1.
